briefTitle: A Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of a Single Injection of Corifollitropin Alfa (Organon 36286) for Ovarian Stimulation Using Daily Recombinant Follicle Stimulating Hormone (FSH) as Reference (P05787)

armGroups.label: 150 Âµg Corifollitropin Alfa
interventionNames: Biological: RecFSH / Follitropin beta (Days 8 to hCG)

armGroups.label: 200 IU recFSH
interventionNames: Biological: RecFSH / Follitropin beta (Days 8 to hCG)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With an Ongoing Pregnancy (Ongoing Pregnancy Rate)
outcomeMeasures.description: An ongoing pregnancy is a fetus with heart activity at least 10 weeks after embryo transfer as assessed by Ultrasound Scan (USS) or Doppler or is confirmed by live birth. The ongoing pregnancy rate is 100 times the number of participants with an ongoing pregnancy after embryo transfer, divided by the total number of participants who started treatment. Calculations were made per attempt, meaning that participants who did not have embryo transfers were considered not pregnant.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Number of Oocytes Retrieved
outcomeMeasures.description: Up to 36 hours after receiving hCG, cumulus-oocyte-complexes were retrieved. Mean numbers retrieved were calculated per attempt, meaning that if a participant did not reach this stage in In Vitro Fertilization (IVF) treatment, zero values were imputed.

outcomeMeasures.title: Median Amount of Recombinant FSH Needed to Induce Multifollicular Development Starting at Day 1
outcomeMeasures.description: The amount of recFSH administered for a participant to reach 3 follicles \>= 17 mm, starting from treatment Day 1 onwards.

outcomeMeasures.title: Median Amount of Recombinant FSH Needed to Induce Multifollicular Development Starting at Day 8
outcomeMeasures.description: The amount of recFSH administered for a participant to reach 3 follicles \>= 17 mm, starting from treatment Day 8 onwards.

outcomeMeasures.title: Serum FSH Levels During Stimulation
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean serum FSH are presented over one Controlled Ovarian Stimulation (COS) cycle: from Day 1 (Pre-dose) up to the day of hCG treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Serum Luteinizing Hormone (LH) Levels During Stimulation
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean serum LH levels are presented over one COS cycle: from Day 1 (Pre-dose) up to the day of hCG treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Serum Estradiol (E2) Levels During Stimulation
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean serum E2 levels are presented over one COS cycle: from Day 1 (Pre-dose) up to the day of hCG treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Serum Progesterone (P) Levels During Stimulation
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean serum P levels are presented over one COS cycle: from Day 1 (Pre-dose) up to day of hCG treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Serum Inhibin-B Levels During Stimulation
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean serum Inhibin-B levels are presented over one COS cycle: from Day 1 (Pre-dose) up to day of hCG treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Follicles Categorized by Size on Stimulation Day 1
outcomeMeasures.description: Ovaries were assessed during stimulation by ultrasonographic investigation (USS), and the mean number of follicles are categorized by their size.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Follicles Categorized by Size on Stimulation Day 5
outcomeMeasures.description: Ovaries were assessed during stimulation by USS, and the mean number of follicles are categorized by their size.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Follicles Categorized by Size on Stimulation Day 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Ovaries were assessed during stimulation by USS, and the mean number of follicles are categorized by their size.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Follicles Categorized by Size on the Day of hCG
outcomeMeasures.description: Ovaries were assessed during stimulation by USS, and the mean number of follicles are categorized by their size.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Cumulus-oocyte-complexes
outcomeMeasures.description: Prior to IVF the mean number of cumulus-oocyte-complexes used for IVF was assessed

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Oocytes Assessed Prior to Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection (ICSI)
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of oocytes used for ICSI was assessed, and categorized based on their quality

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Fertilized Oocytes (Fertilization Rate)
outcomeMeasures.description: The fertilization rate is 100 times the number of fertilized 2 pro-nuclei (2PN) oocytes obtained, divided by the number of oocytes fertilized by IVF or ICSI

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Embryos Obtained on Day 3 Categorized by Quality
outcomeMeasures.description: Embryos obtained on Day 3 were categorized by their qualiity as follows: Grade 1: excellent: No fragmentation, 6-10 cells, and equal blastomere size taking the impact of cell division into account. Grade 2: good: \< 20% fragmentation, 6-10 cells, and equal blastomere size taking the impact of cell division into account. Grade 3: fair: 20-50% fragmentation and/or less than 6 cells and/or multinucleation (if observed). Other Grade: Embryos that do not qualify as Grades 1, 2 or 3. Grades 1 and 2 are considered good quality.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Embryos Transferred on Day 3
outcomeMeasures.description: After fertilization, the mean number of embryos transferred on Day 3 were assessed. Total and good quality embryos are presented, with good quality embryos, Grades 1 and 2, defined as the following: Grade 1: excellent: No fragmentation, 6-10 cells, and equal blastomere size taking the impact of cell division into account. Grade 2: good: \< 20% fragmentation, 6-10 cells, and equal blastomere size taking the impact of cell division into account.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Gestational Sacs (Implantation Rate)
outcomeMeasures.description: The implantation rate is 100 times the number of gestational sacs assessed by USS after embryo transfer, divided by the number of embryos transferred.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With a Miscarriage (Miscarriage Rate) Per Clinical Pregnancy
outcomeMeasures.description: The miscarriage rate is 100 times the number of miscarriages, divided by the number of clinical pregnancies assessed by USS. A clinical pregnancy is the presence of at least one gestational sac or confirmed by live birth.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With a Miscarriage (Miscarriage Rate) Per Vital Pregnancy
outcomeMeasures.description: The miscarriage rate is 100 times the number of miscarriages, divided by the number of vital pregnancies assessed by USS. A vital pregnancy is the presence of at least one fetus with heart activity.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With a Biochemical Pregnancy (Pregnancy Rate) Per Attempt
outcomeMeasures.description: Biochemical pregnancy was assessed by measuring serum or urinary hCG. Per attempt means that if a participant did not reach the stage of pregnancy assessment zero values were imputed. The pregnancy rate is 100 times the number of participants with pregnancies detected, divided by the number of participants assessed.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With a Biochemical Pregnancy (Pregnancy Rate) Per Embryo Transfer
outcomeMeasures.description: Biochemical pregnancy was assessed for participants who had embryo transfer by measuring serum or urinary hCG. The pregnancy rate is 100 times the number of participants with pregnancies detected, divided by the number of participants assessed.
